function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases in the construction industry","Impact":"Loss of jobs and economic decline due to inability to work from home","Mitigation":"Implementing remote work options, enhanced health and safety measures, and crisis management protocols","Technologies":"Remote collaboration tools, health monitoring technology, crisis management software","People":"Workers in the construction industry","Owner":"Construction companies and government"}]}
